CustomField.description: Enable Google Docs Upload. Check here if you want to allow users to upload this doc to Google docs. Your org must be properly configured for S-Docs to work with Google Docs (see documentation for setup steps)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable Google Docs Upload. Check here if you want to allow users to upload this doc to Google docs. Your org must be properly configured for S-Docs to work with Google Docs (see documentation for setup steps)
CustomField.label: Google Docs Enabled
